msbt.message: Huh? You from here? Nah, you look way too lost to be from these parts.Name's and, as a matter of fact, today's my first day on !Nice to get a guest on my first day, even if it ain't a local. You ever make it back here, be sure to stop by!

Well, you've got a bewildered look about you. Are you from another island or somethin'?The name's and if you can't tell from the boxes, it's my first day here.Hope you weren't gonna ask me to show you around. I'd be almost as lost as you, kiddo.Anyway, pleased to meet you. Now if you don't mind, I gotta get back to unpackin'. Take care now!

Whew! I tell you, all this unpacking's got my back throwin' a monster of a fit! Ah, where are my manners Name's . Just got here today. How do you do?Well, you ain't here to listen to me whine, and I got a lot more back pain ahead of me. Come by later on?

Don't think I've seen you around these parts. You a tourist? Heya. Name's .You picked the right island to visit, let me tell you! 's just perfect for these ol' bones.Well, don't let me stop you. Go nose around, talk to folk, and enjoy yourself, !
Eh? You visitin' ? Pleasure to meet you! I'm .Always happy to greet a stranger. We've got all the modern amenities here. Feel free to use 'em!

Are you the gadabout on everyone's mind?Not tryin' to be rude. Someone said we had an off-islander pokin' around, and you looked lost, I'm , by the way. Anyway, now that we're introduced, I'll leave you be. Take care!
